title: How to Crush a Sunday Morning with David Walton
itunes:title: How to Crush a Sunday Morning with David Walton
description:
We hope that everyone had a great Thanksgiving and is now ready to sit back, relax, and do less. At least that’s the hope from this week’s guest, actor David Walton. He walks us through his binky (er, backpack) full of Add to Carts. Plus, Su and Ku introduce a new gift category: One for You, One for Me!

 

Please note, Add To Cart contains mature themes and may not be appropriate for all listeners. 

 

To see all products mentioned in this episode, head to @addtocartpod on Instagram. To purchase any of the products, see below. 

 

  • The best bathrobe, Wakanicci: https://bit.ly/thebestrobe
  • David’s backpack: https://bit.ly/goruckpack
  • Bill Ringa Slippers: https://bit.ly/billringaslippers
  • Pablo, who is maybe for sale? https://bit.ly/pabloforsale
  • Darn tough socks: http://bit.ly/darntoughsocks
  • Air Vape X: https://bit.ly/airvapexapollo
  • The Drug Users Bible: https://bit.ly/drugusersbible
  • Bombas Slippers for You: https://bit.ly/bombasgripperslipper
  • Bombas Slippers for Ku: https://bit.ly/kusgripperslipper
  • Leather Desk Pad for You: https://bit.ly/grovedeskpad
  • Leather Desk Pad for Ku: https://bit.ly/kusdeskpad
  • Pillow for You and Su: https://bit.ly/coopbodypillows
  • Turn Me Royal: https://bit.ly/turnmeroyal

 

Stay up to date with us on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram at @LemonadaMedia. 

 

Joining Lemonada Premium is a great way to support our show and get bonus content. Subscribe today at bit.ly/lemonadapremium. 

 

Click this link for a list of current sponsors and discount codes for this show and all Lemonada shows: lemonadamedia.com/sponsors
